title: kaicrypzen

content: I'm looking to sell XAUR https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xaurum for a discount, based on market price https://mercatox.com/exchange/XAUR/BTC. That's the only market according to Coinmarketcap.I don't want to create an account on Mercatox so I'm happy selling for a discount.I have no idea if Mercatox is legit or if the XAUR/BTC market in there is, and have no intention of reseaching that, so DYOR.I can sell for any cryptocurrency that I can easily exchange.Feel free to PM me.

comments.author: kaicrypzen
comments.body: Bump. It's still up for sale if anyone's interested.

comments.author: kaicrypzen
comments.body: Bump.The one market I know: https://mercatox.com/exchange/XAUR/BTC. Do your own research.Selling for 63 sats a piece. Highest buy order is 68.Lowest sell order is 82.Latest trade is 79.You would make a profit even selling at market price. You could set a sell order and make more.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: i used to use Mercetox back in the day and never got any serious challenge with them. I will check if my account is still on the platform. The pair is still there though with high spread. So you might wanna consider that with your trading partner.I could help if my account is still active, but what discount are we talking about here, and how would you want the trade to proceed?I wouldn't want to lose my funds.

I've got some positive trust, we can use an escrow if you want, you can suggest a reputable one if you are interested.

comments.author: kaicrypzen
comments.body: Bump.Still selling for 63 sats a piece.According to https://mercatox.com/exchange/XAUR/BTC, the highest buy order is at 79 sats so that's an immediate 20% profit.I'm prepared to sell for this discount because I don't want to bother with creating an account on Mercatox.Feel free to PM me or answer in this thread if you are interested.
